items.title: DistanceRecord
items.description: A list of distance measurements that are defined relative to one another rather than using GPS coordinates.

timestamp.description: Time that the system has been awake since last reboot.

stepPath.description: An identifier marking the current step.

timestampDate.description: The date timestamp when the measurement was taken (if available).

timestampUnix.description: The Unix timestamp (seconds since 1970-01-01T00:00:00.000Z) when the measurement was taken.

horizontalAccuracy.description: The horizontal accuracy of the location in meters; null if the lateral location is invalid.

relativeDistance.description: The lateral distance between the current location and the previous location in meters.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the current location; null if *only* relative distance should be recorded.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the current location; null if *only* relative distance should be recorded.

verticalAccuracy.description: The vertical accuracy of the location in meters; null if the vertical location is invalid.

altitude.description: The altitude of the location in meters. Can be positive (above sea level) or negative (below sea level).

totalDistance.description: Sum of the relative distance measurements if the participant is supposed to be moving; null if participant is supposed to be standing still.

course.description: The course of the location in degrees true North; null if course is invalid. Range: 0.0 - 359.9 degrees, 0 being true North.

bearingRadians.description: The bearing to the location from the previous location in radians (clockwise from) true North. Range: [0.0..2Ï€), 0 being true North.

speed.description: The speed of the location in meters/second; null if speed is invalid.

floor.description: The floor of the building where the location was recorded; null if floor is not available.
